smarterAppMetadata.Subject: ELA
smarterAppMetadata.SufficientEvidenceOfClaim: "2. (Elaboration) The student will use information provided in a stimulus to write well-supported arguments by applying elaboration techniques such as b. Reverencing, and/or integrating relevant and credible evidence to support reasons/claims/counterclaims"
smarterAppMetadata.EvidenceStatement: "2. (Elaboration) The student will use information provided in a stimulus to write well-supported arguments by applying elaboration techniques such as b. Reverencing, and/or integrating relevant and credible evidence to support reasons/claims/counterclaims"
